problem.p: My answer to part 1 is justified because:

choicegroup.choice: Mechanical energy is conserved in all areas in this problem.
Mechanical energy is conserved in areas without friction.
Mechanical energy is conserved in areas without friction and in areas where the ball is rolling without slipping.
When the ball moves from the frictionless slope to the flat area with friction, the transition can be modeled as a collision.
